original_title: Bryan Ferry - Dylanesque Live The London Sessions
overview: Dylanesque is a 2007 album by Bryan Ferry, the former lead vocalist for Roxy Music. The album consists covers of Bob Dylan songs. As of 11 July 2007 it has sold 11,985 copies in the US and has reached the Top 10 on both United Kingdom and Swedish album charts.
title: Bryan Ferry - Dylanesque Live The London Sessions
